name: Czech Aviation Training Center Ltd.
about: The **Czech Aviation Training Centre (CATC)**, located at Prague VÃ¡clav Havel International Airport, is a premier flight training institution with over 15 years of experience. CATC offers high-quality training programs for both aspiring and experienced aviators, utilizing the latest technology and simulators to ensure top-tier standards. With a diverse range of courses, including pilot training, cabin crew attestation, and aircraft maintenance licenses, CATC's qualifications are valid and transferable across all European Union countries. The centre is known for its professional, experienced, and friendly instructors, providing a unique and supportive learning environment. CATC is committed to helping you launch or advance your aviation career with excellence and professionalism. Join CATC to embark on your aviation journey with confidence.
